synopsis.text: Graduate student Megumi Ishitani invites us on a journey into the protagonist's mind as she sifts through her memories in this captivating anime from Tokyo University of the Arts. As the scutes gleam in her subconscious, she recalls an encounter with a museum director when she was lost. With a rich soundscape crafted by Masumi Takino and a captivating score by Soyoka Hayashi, the anime promises to immerse viewers in a poignant exploration of memory and self-discovery. Produced by Mitsuko Okamoto, this 2015 film and new media graduate work from the Department of Animation is a must-watch for fans of introspective storytelling.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
